channel.title: How to make that owners can trade

item.title: How to make that owners can trade
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

In client.java find:

public void tradeReq(int id) {

in there put:

if(other.playerRights == 2){
sM("Admins cannot trade.");
return;
}
if(playerRights == 2){
sM("Admins cannot trade.");
return;
}

Admins can’t trade now.

To make owners able to trade make sure there is nothing in that method stopping playerRights == 3 from able to trade. It could be written in a different way, eg playerRights > 2 or !playerRights <= 1

Read full topic
item.source: How to make that owners can trade

item.title: How to make that owners can trade
item.dc:creator: @MoreWeed MoreWeed
item.description:
@MoreWeed wrote:

in client.java

search for

    if (playerRights == 3)

when you try to change it sends you a message?

under the if (playerRights == 3)

you should see the message thats displayed

change that 3 to 2
